Package com.hp.autonomy.frontend.reports.powerpoint

Provides an API to generate PowerPoint reports from visualization data.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ImageSource
    An interface to convert image identifiers into actual image data for embedding into PowerPoint.
    PowerPointService
    Primary interface to the PowerPoint API.
    TemplateSettingsSource
    An interface to allow specifying service-wide settings.
    TemplateSource
    An interface to get the PowerPoint template.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataUriImageSource
    Default implementation of ImageSource; treats all image identifiers as base64-encoded data URLs.
    ImageData
    Data class to store image type and data.
    PowerPointServiceImpl
    Default implementation of PowerPointService.
    TemplateSettings
    Template settings which affect rendering, set on a service-wide level.
    WebAndDataUriImageSource
    This ImageSource implementation fetches http: and https: URLs from the internet for embedding and treats all other image identifiers as base64-encoded data URLs.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TemplateLoadException
    Exception to represent any template-related errors.

Package com.hp.autonomy.frontend.reports.powerpoint Description

Provides an API to generate PowerPoint reports from visualization data.
See Also:
README.md for examples and usage instructions.
